quoteText: If you are under the age of 13, you are not permitted to register with Hulu or provide your personal information to Hulu. If you are at least 13 and under 18 years of age (or under the applicable age of majority in your state or territory of residence), you may register with Hulu only if you have the consent of your parent or guardian, including consent to these Terms on your behalf, and for clarity, may only modify an account, or associated profiles, with the consent of your parent or guardian.
title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
